author: Sweta Akundi
title: For home nurses, coronavirus lockdown means no going back to families
description: What does it mean to stay under lockdown in someone else’s home? Ahead of World Health Day, we speak to home nurses who have chosen duty over family
content: Meenakshi Gulab Shende sits on the floor to video call her daughters, aged two and five. Ma, when will you come back? they ask. I came home this morning, but you were asleep and I had to head back to work! she offers an innocent lie. Its okay ma, tu zha kamal… [+5234 chars]
